name: Boston Strangler
description: Loretta McLaughlin was the reporter who first connected the murders and broke the story of the Boston Strangler. She and Jean Cole challenged the sexism of the early 1960s to report on the city's most notorious serial killer.

review.author: dweston-38669
review.heading: Knee before Zodiac.
review.reviewBody:
Of course any recent journalistic true crime thriller will owe a debt too the grandaddy of them all, Zodiac ,to its 60s design, to creepy supporting players offering evidence that is a dead end (Charles Fleischer's movie buff projectionist), to shoe leather investigating, phone calls in the night with heavy breathing and obsession.

If one is too be inspired/steal then do it from the best.

This is a solid,well told thriller, Keira Knightley's accent is better than I was expecting and whilst it isn't as good as 'She Said' the female investigating team has charm, originality and something to say.
